property.name: objectLabel
property.value: Reg Response Item

property.name: objectDescription
property.value: A more granular status object than the Registration response which gives the response status of the individual registration item, i.e., a course reg group. It has a reference to the Course Registration in case of a successful registration. The response contains status such as SUCCESS or FAILURE and then necessary messages, warning or errors. The state of the response in case of a success can be registered, waitlisted, or holdlisted.

property.name: shortLabel
property.value: Reg Request Item Id

property.value: This method ...

property.name: description
property.value: This method ...

property.name: summary
property.value: Returns the warning messages for this transaction.

property.name: description
property.value: Returns the warning messages for this transaction. Returns an empty list if there are no warnings.

property.name: summary
property.value: Returns the error messages for this transaction.

property.name: description
property.value: Returns the error messages for this transaction. Returns an empty list if there are no errors.
